metadata.title: CVE-2022-27406 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
FreeType commit 22a0cccb4d9d002f33c1ba7a4b36812c7d4f46b5 was discovered tocontain a segmentation violation via the function FT_Request_Size.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-27406` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.11.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1
libfreetype6 - 2.11.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.11.1+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1').
